Plot: Living in exile, Hannibal Lecter tries to reconnect with now disgraced FBI agent Clarice Starling and finds himself a target for revenge from a powerful victim.
Title: Hannibal
Writer: Thomas Harris (novel), David Mamet (screenplay), Steven Zaillian (screenplay)
Actors: Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman, Ray Liotta
tomatoConsensus: While superbly acted and stylishly filmed, Hannibal lacks the character interaction between the two leads which made the first movie so engrossing.
